name: tm30
effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Teleport)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
